snippet: Riunite, a sparkling wine, will focus on reaching consumers through its Web site, a shift from the catchy TV campaign that helped make it popular in the 1970s.
abstract: Riunite, a sparkling wine, will focus on reaching consumers through its Web site, a shift from the catchy TV campaign that helped make it popular in the 1970s.

headline.main: Once 'On Ice,' Riunite Goes for a Chill
headline.print_headline: Once ‘On Ice,’ Riunite Goes for a Chill
